info.author: Konrad Hinsen
info.description:
The Molecular Modelling Toolkit (MMTK) is an Open Source program
library for molecular simulation applications. In addition to providing
ready-to-use implementations of standard algorithms, MMTK serves as a
code basis that can be easily extended and modified to deal with
standard and non-standard problems in molecular simulations.
info.name: MMTK
info.html_description: The Molecular Modelling Toolkit (MMTK) is an Open Source program library for molecular simulation applications. In addition to providing ready-to-use implementations of standard algorithms, MMTK serves as a code basis that can be easily extended and modified to deal with standard and non-standard problems in molecular simulations.
